text: Skirving is a surname. It may refer to: *Adam Skirving (1719-1803), Scottish song writer *Alexander Skirving (1868–1935), trade union secretary and politician *Angie Skirving (born 1981), Australian Women's Field Hockey player *Archibald Skirving (1749–1819), Scottish portrait painter *Ben Skirving (born 1983), English rugby union footballer *Catherine Seaton Skirving (Ewart) (1818–1897), Canadian philanthropist and volunteer *Imogen Skirving (1937–2016), British hotelier *John Skirving Ewart or J. S. Ewart (1849–1933), Canadian lawyer *Robert Skirving, bishop of the Episcopal Diocese of East Carolina, USA *William Skirving (c. 1745–1796) activist, one of the five Scottish Martyrs for Liberty
title: Skirving
